effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder has full HP and is attacked for regular damage that would faint it, this item is consumed and prevents the holder's HP from lowering below 1.  This effect works against multi-hit attacks, but does not work against the effects of Doom Desire or Future Sight.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder survives any single-hit attack at 1 HP if at max HP, then the item is consumed.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it
has full HP, the holder will endure one
potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it
has full HP, the holder will endure one
potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it
has full HP, the holder will endure one
potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

Objet à tenir permettant au porteur,
s’il a ses PV pleins, d’éviter un
potentiel K.O. en conservant un PV.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it
has full HP, the holder will endure one
potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it
has full HP, the holder will endure one
potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

もたせると　ＨＰが　まんたんのとき
ひんしになりそうな　わざを　うけても
ＨＰ１で　いちどだけ　たえる。

지니게 하면 HP가 꽉 찼을 때
기절할 듯한 기술을 당해도
HP 1로 한 번은 버틴다.

Objet à tenir. S’il a encore tous ses PV,
le porteur pourra éviter d’être mis K.O. en
un coup. Il ne conserva alors qu’un seul PV.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Bei vollen KP bleibt
der Träger nach einer K.O.-Attacke einmalig
mit 1 KP im Kampf.

Potencia la Defensa Especial de base, pero
reduce la Velocidad en combate. Debe llevarla
un Pokémon.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Se il Pokémon ha tutti i PS, eviterà un
potenziale KO, rimanendo con un PS.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
has full HP, it will endure a potential KO
attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

持たせると　ＨＰが　満タンのとき
ひんしになりそうな　技を　受けても
ＨＰ１で　１度だけ　耐える。

もたせると　ＨＰが　まんたんのとき
ひんしになりそうな　わざを　うけても
ＨＰ１で　いちどだけ　たえる。

지니게 하면 HP가 꽉 찼을 때
기절할 듯한 기술을 당해도
HP 1로 한 번은 버틴다.

攜帶後，在ＨＰ全滿時，
即使受到可能導致瀕死的招式攻擊，
也能以１ＨＰ僅撐過１次。

Objet à tenir. S’il a encore tous ses PV, le porteur
pourra éviter d’être mis K.O. en un coup.
Il ne conservera alors qu’un seul PV.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Bei vollen KP bleibt der Träger
nach einer K.O.-Attacke einmalig mit 1 KP im
Kampf.

Si el Pokémon que la lleva tiene los PS al máximo,
puede resistir un golpe que lo dejaría K. O. y se
queda con 1 PS.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Se il Pokémon ha tutti i PS, eviterà un
potenziale KO, rimanendo con un PS.
